turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi how are you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All right, how are you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I'm great. how can I help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I'm trying to order a cappuccino from the.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Are you there?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I'm here.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hello?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, can you hear me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, great. I'm trying to order I'm trying to order a cappuccino from the Steaming Kettle Starbucks in Boston, Massachusetts.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You got it. What kind of milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I was thinking I might try the cappuccino with almond milk this time, see how that is.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and what size did you want it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Because I'm trying something new, let's go with the short.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure. did you want whipped cream with that? or any flavored syrups?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Not this time, no.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So that's an almond milk cappuccino sized short from the steamkettle starbucks in boston right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great. Your order will be ready in 15 minutes and you'll get the reciept via mobile.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I think that's it. All right. I'll look for it. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem, have a good day.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You too.
